phrases: Zankoku na tenshi no youni Like an angel without a sense of mercy...
Shonen yo shinwa ni nare...rise young boy to the heavens as a legend.
Aoi kaze ga i am about to Cold winds, as blue as the sea...
Tear open the door to your heart...
But unknowing you seem, just staring at me...
Sotto fureru mono Desperate for something to touch...
Motomeru koto ni muchu de A moment of kindness like that in a dream..
Your innocent eyes as yet have no idea...
Itaikena hitomi...of the path your destiny will follow.
But someday you will become aware of...
Sono senaka niwa...everything that you have got behind you.
Your wings are for seeking out...
Hanega arukoto...a new future that only you can search for.
Madobe kara yagate tobitatsu...through a portal like your pulsing blood.
Hotobashiru atsui pathos de If you should betray the chapel of your memories...
Omoide wo uragiru nara...the cruel angel will enter the window of your soul.
So boy, stand tall and embrace the fire of legend...
Embrace the universe like a blazing star!
Correct, I have already arranged it with the committee.
The cargo left from Sasebo Port yesterday,
and is now making its way here across the Pacific ocean.
I would never have believed I would get chance to fly in one.
Thank God I have a buddy like you, Shinji!
I thought you guys must be sick of being cramped up,
so I just invited you on a date!
I bought this cap for today, Misato!
We will take a little jaunt across the Pacific on that gorgeous cruiser.
Five aircraft carriers and four battleships!
I am absolutely sure the best thing in life is having a great buddy!
That is the pride of the YOU.N., the glorious regular carrier
I am surprised that such a relic is still afloat.
Naw, it is not so bad.
It is a vintage model from just before the Second Impact.
That shrew's gone and brought a socket for that kid's toy,
so the little gophers can run amuck!
This kind of thing brings a tear to the heart of a real man!
You have grown some, have not you?
I am not just taller, my figure's filled out as well.
This is the pilot of Evangelion Unit 02, the Second Child,
What did you do that for?!
Quite a bargain, do not you think?
You think it is worth that?!
Here, take a look at mine!
So, which one is the famous Third Child?
Do not tell me it is him.
Do not worry, here he is.
Well, he looks kind of dull.
I thought you were the leader of this gang of Boy Scouts,
Thank you for your understanding, Captain.
Oh no, thank you for giving me the opportunity to baby-sit more kids.
We appreciate your assistance in the marine transport of Unit 02.
Here are the specs for the emergency power supply socket.
In the first place, I would never approve any request
to activate that toy while at sea.
Why do not you just think of this as being prepared for an emergency?
That is why the Pacific Fleet is guarding it.
When did the YOU.N. transform us into a bloody cargo service?
It was just after a certain organization was established.
What a grandiose assignment for the Pacific Fleet!
It is still not enough considering the importance of the Eva.
Eva Unit 02 and its pilot have been entrusted to us
by the Third Branch in Germany.
I will not let you just waltz in, and do as you please!
Then, when will you transfer them to us?
Once we have unloaded in New Yokosuka.
You will follow our orders here.
However, I should remind you that, in the case of an emergency,
Well, you are as gallant as always.
Mr. Kaji, I must insist that you not invite yourself onto the bridge.
Transport us to New Yokosuka as ordered.
Transport us to New Yokosuka as ordered.
Transport us to New Yokosuka as ordered.
Those kids are really going to save the Earth?
I understand that Congress has pinned its hopes on that robot.
If they have got money to blow, they ought to give us a little more.
I am on a business trip from Germany.
My God, why are you so cold?
My God, why are you so cold?
Do you have a boyfriend now?
My God, why are you so cold?
Do you have a boyfriend now?
Because your fire has gone out.
Do you have a boyfriend now?
Outside it is a red hot summer, over 100 degrees.
That is none of your business, is it?
Outside it is a red hot summer, over 100 degrees.
How can you be so mean?
Outside it is a red hot summer, over 100 degrees.
How can you be so mean?
You are living with Katsuragi here, are not you?
You are living with Katsuragi here, are not you?
Your heart has too much air conditioning.
So, tell me, is she still wild in bed?
Your heart has too much air conditioning.
So, tell me, is she still wild in bed?
Why do not you raise the temperature?
Why do not you raise the temperature?
You are so stupid, venting your heat externally.
You are so stupid, venting your heat externally.
The more heat you vent, the colder my heart.
The more heat you vent, the colder my heart.
So, she has not changed, has she, Shinji Ikari?
The more heat you vent, the colder my heart.
So, she has not changed, has she, Shinji Ikari?
Then, let us warm your frozen body together!
Then, let us warm your frozen body together!
I am sorry, you cannot light my heart,
How do you know my name?
I am sorry, you cannot light my heart,
Well, I ought to know you.
I am sorry, you cannot light my heart,
Well, I ought to know you.
Put logs on my fire, and stoke me with oil.
You are pretty famous in our business.
Put logs on my fire, and stoke me with oil.
You are pretty famous in our business.
The Third Child, who piloted an Eva in battle with no training.
The Third Child, who piloted an Eva in battle with no training.
You are telling me that I lost to this puppy?
Luck is a part of your destiny.
You are telling me that I lost to this puppy?
Luck is a part of your destiny.
Yes, he is a good boy.
Yes, he is a good boy.
Well, I will see you later.
And he is faithful, unlike some people!
And he is faithful, unlike some people!
This has got to be a bad joke.
So, what do you think about Mister Shinji Ikari?
That is the great Third Child?
Yet his sync ratio was well over 40 in combat with no training.
That captain's attitude gets on my nerves.
He is got a lot of pride.
Too much pride's bound to make him cynical about us.
That Mr. Kaji is pretty lively.
He has not changed at all, that jerk.
I did not know that Unit 02 was red.
The color is not the only difference.
After all, Units 00 and 01 were created
as part of a developing process, prototype and test type.
The fact that it synchronized with an untrained pilot like you
However, Unit 02 is a little different.
this is the world's first true Evangelion.
We have got to go back, and find Misato.
All ships maintain formation, and take evasive action!
Titus Andronicus cannot locate the target!
What in the hell is going on here?!
Would you like to order information on this enemy
and countermeasures to use against it?
This is just my opinion, but I would say this must be an Angel attack.
An AT field cannot be penetrated with this kind of fire power.
But why is an Angel here?
My God, is it after Unit 02?
Why are all boys such perverted jerks?
Only an Eva can beat it!
Hey, what are these entry-plug suits for?
We are going to beat it with my Unit 02!
Do you have approval from Misato?
I will get permission after I have beaten it.
Now, I will show you how magnificent my piloting is!
It seems to be looking for something.
I did not expect to see an Angel here.
This is not how it is supposed to be, is it?
This is what Unit 02 is for,
and I have generously provided a second pilot as a reserve.
If worse comes to worst, you can escape by yourself.
I told you not to disturb me.
You are thinking in Japanese, are not you?
Switch the language to basic Japanese.
Unit 02 is in the process of activation.
Eva and its pilot are under our control!
You are violating my command authority!
Who gives a damn about your procedures?
You do know that Unit 02 is still using the type-B equipment?
If we fall in the sea, we are done for!
And if we do not, we will be fine, all right?
Shinji, are you in there too?
We have only got 58 seconds left!
I am well aware of that!
Get the external power supply socket onto the flight deck.
What is she going to do?
The power socket is in place!
The deck is ready for Eva landing!
It is coming! 9 of the clock!
But we do not have any weapons.
The progressive knife should be good enough.
It is bigger than I thought.
What are they going to do?!
Hand-to-hand combat is the best way to defeat Angels.
Look at the mess you have made of the deck!
It is impossible to fight under water with the type-B equipment!
What are you going to do?
We can deal with it somehow.
I have got to do something.
The cable's going to run out!
I have got time to change the disk.
I have got something to deliver, so I will be taking off now.
Take care of the rest of this, Captain Katsuragi.
The target is approaching Eva again!
I will finish it off this time.
That is because this is B-type equipment.
What are you going to do?!
What am I going to do?
You are the Third Child, are not you?
That is because it is an Angel.
Eva 02 has entered the target's body.
Does that mean that the Eva's been eaten?
From a bad situation to a worse one.
Hey, get off me already, you pervert!
But we have got to free ourselves.
Do not let go of it!
A point-blank assault by two of the surviving battleships?!
We will scuttle two of the evacuated battleships
on top of the umbilical cable to set a trap.
When the Eva opens the target's mouth, both ships will rush in.
They will fire all of their bow turret cannons,
and then self-destruct, destroying the target.
The frigates will rescue the lifeboats!
Do not use Unit 02 without my permission!
Do the two of you understand the operation?
All ships, open the Kingston valve!
Hey, you are touching my... get off!
But we have got to open its mouth, or we will be killed!
Both battleships are sinking towards the target.
Eva is continuing to surface, T-minus 50 to contact.
Target has passed beneath the Tempest!
Or you will not make it!
Do not get any strange ideas.
Anyway, just concentrate on your thoughts.
I should have anticipated underwater combat.
It is rare for you to regret anything.
Is this some kind of self-analysis?
We have collected a lot of valuable data.
They broke their synchronization ratio records, did not they?
It must have been due to the danger.
That idiot's got to be back at headquarters by now!
It was a pretty eventful trip.
Was it caused by this, I wonder?
It is already restored itself this far.
It is frozen inside dura-bakelite, but it is still alive.
This is the keystone of the Human Instrumentality Project, is not it?
This is the first human being.
She may have looked cute, but she was a real bitch.
Well, we will not have to see her again.
Yeah, old Mister Big Shot has to see her at work though.
I really feel sorry for you.
My name is Asuka Langley Sohryu.
I am very pleased to meet you.
It is the first combination attack with two Evas...
Misato develops a plan to coach them into perfect unison.
Next time: Momentarily Unite the Minds
